pkgmetadata.longdescription: Variable Penalty Dynamic Time Warping // Variable Penalty Dynamic Time Warping (VPdtw) for aligning chromatographic signals. With an appropriate penalty this method performs good alignment of chromatographic data without deforming the peaks (Clifford, D., Stone, G., Montoliu, I., Rezzi S., Martin F., Guy P., Bruce S., and Kochhar S.(2009) doi:10.1021/ac802041e; Clifford, D. and Stone, G. (2012) doi:10.18637/jss.v047.i08).
